message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $130?
I'm getting close to accepting, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
